__e: When they pulled him out of the water, they found a revolver on him.
I just thought you should know. There's a black man shooting at your front door.
Which gun do you like for the final scene?
So you took your father's gun to scare him off.
Now,what I couldn't do was take the gun out of his hands the night he killed someone.
Without the gun I'm nothing, and I never had anything before I got one.
If I had gone with the police with my gun I could've shot him, couldn't I father?
The gun, I'm asking you to take it.
So I took my revolver... and I came in here... to investigate.
No, but he does have a gun. And he's out there running around.
I took the gun from him and told my mom and the police that I did it.
I don't need any more guns in my life, that's for sure.
No, I don't think so, seeing as how I found the gun in the nightstand next to the bed.
What? There are no guns in this whole town?
Was that the man who came into your house after the shooting? Carrying a revolver in his hand.
When he pulled out the revolver, for a moment, I truly thought he was going to...
The only reason she had that gun in the first place was because the cop you hired gave it to her.
